structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text:
As used in KRS 164.0285 to 164.0288:
"STEM" means science, technology, engineering, and mathematics; and
"Advanced science and mathematics" means Advanced Placement biology, calculus, chemistry, computer science, environmental science, and physics, and International Baccalaureate biology, chemistry, computer science, environmental systems, mathematical studies, further mathematics, and physics.
law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2008.
